summary: Test suite for the PyMAPDL licensing utilities, providing helpers and a collection of unit tests that simulate license server interactions, verify license file handling, check license availability and checkout behavior, read debug logs, assess connection status, and exercise waiting and stopping mechanisms for the license checker.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the licensing workflow in ANSYS MAPDL to ensure that applications can reliably acquire, monitor, and release licenses, thereby preventing runtime failures due to licensing issues.
